title: Wir sind bei den InnoHikes dabei | UTN

text_sections.section_1: We are part of the InnoHikes!
text_sections.section_2: InnoHikes is a mobile application designed for tech-savvy adolescents and young adults preparing to graduate, offered by the Nuremberg metropolitan region. In several challenges you can explore different institutions and companies in the region. Gamification elements and augmented reality provide the necessary fun. The couch potato mode allows you to solve challenges in the comfort of your home, in hiker mode you solve the tasks on the spot. And we are part of it: Discover UTN with the robot dog Byte. There are also other events to get to know us better. On October 21, 2023 you can collect points by visiting our experience cubes.
text_sections.section_3: You can download the free app from the App Store and Google Play. For more information and download links, visit the website of InnoHikes (https://innohikes.de/) .

meta_tags.description: Entdeckt gemeinsam mit Roboterhund Byte die UTN. Die kostenlose App InnoHikes könnt ihr im App Store und bei Google Play herunterladen.
